name: R4_security_labels_for_R5
title: Cross-version VS for R4.All Security Labels for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/security-labels|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R4 to R5.

concept.display: sexual assault, abuse, or domestic violence information sensitivity
sexuality and reproductive health information sensitivity
gender and sexual orientation information sensitivity
no disclosure without information subject's consent directive
no disclosure to patient, family or caregivers without attending provider's authorization
no collection beyond purpose of use
no redisclosure without information subject's consent directive
no reuse beyond purpose of use
clinical trial research without patient care
clinical trial research with patient care
population origins or ancestry healthcare research

contains.display: sexual assault, abuse, or domestic violence information sensitivity
sexuality and reproductive health information sensitivity
gender and sexual orientation information sensitivity
no disclosure without information subject's consent directive
no disclosure to patient, family or caregivers without attending provider's authorization
no collection beyond purpose of use
no redisclosure without information subject's consent directive
no reuse beyond purpose of use
clinical trial research without patient care
clinical trial research with patient care
population origins or ancestry healthcare research
